title: What would your phone say to you if it could talk? - Quora

response.answer_text: I'm using my phone right now, so if it could talk it would probably be about exhaustion and wanting to rest from extended usage ;) Anyway… myself in normal, phone in italic.  Conversation #1 MARCY I’M DYING!! You have 10% battery left. I'm sure you'll survive until the end of this car ride. GET ME TO A CHARGER OR… OR I’LL TURN OFF WHEN YOU NEED ME THE MOST!! If you do that I’ll jailbreak you and try to make a tweak to fix that problem… after all, I didn't bother to get AppleCare+ because you were too expensive… let's keep it cheap and cheerful, shall we? NO! NOT JAILBREAKING!! YOU’LL VOID MY WARRANTY!! **turns phone off**  Conversation #2 Oh no! You’re running out of iCloud storage! How dreadful! NO, I’m NOT buying iCloud storage! But then you won't be able to backup your photos! What about those photos of your school trip to the Burren? You wouldn't want to lose those! I'll use Google Photos for that! WHAAAAT?? GOOGLE? HOW CAN YOU TRUST THEM? And I'll switch to Gmail if you keep being so annoying! OH NO YOU DIDN’T JUST SAY THAT! Actually I’ll just buy a Google Pixel instead ;) MARCELLA BUONO! HOW DARE YOU SAY THAT! **plays loud rock song with profane lyrics** OK, OK, I won't buy the Google Pixel **sighs**. It's too bad really, I was looking forward to all its awesome features.  Conversation #3 MARCY! BUY THE IPHONE 7 NOW! IT’S WATERPROOF! You’re an iPhone 6, for goodness sake! You’re new enough, and I'm not buying a new iPhone when I don't need one! But you’be been running out of storage for ages now. You could get the iPhone 7+ in 256GB instead of a mediocre iPhone 6 in 64GB! You're calling yourself mediocre, you know that? And buy AppleCare+ while you're at it. You’ll need it for your new iPad Pro in 256GB! Who said I’m going to buy an iPad Pro when my 3rd Gen iPad is good enough?? I did, and I'm going to keep trying to convince you until you do, by slowing down and not having new features from new versions of iOS! You're just full of ads! I'm going to buy a Google Pixel if you don't shut up! **dies** **sigh** Just when I needed to post this Quora answer! Oh well, I’ll have to do it at home!

If my phone could talk ,it would say to me the following ….. I don't like to wear that flip cover...I look fat with that !!!! Why you let me fall down in the morning ??..Say thanks to my Corning Gorilla glass 3 that it didn't break!!!! Downloading new song....ohhh noo please...again you will listen the same song for 15-20 times that is also in repeat!!!! You are crazy....!!! I have 1.8 GHz quad core processor but mostly you use me for listening songs and clicking pictures of animals,birds,trees,river,moon,sun just because I have 13 megapixel primary camera!!!! Music music and just music...you love music so much then you could have done any course related to music...why the hell you have done engineering...???? and you talk about following passion...really???? You eat multiple plates of meal per day but you don't like to put me on charge , say thanks to my 3000 mAH Li-polymer battery which gives you amazing usage and standby time. There are lot of item and rap songs but you love to listen slow songs like aur ahista kijiye batein by Pankaj udhas, that's why your life is also Udaas ,no fun at all !!! I have 4GB RAM but you don't use apps like tinder,instagram or facebook messenger ,you are not so active on quora also...you are so boring...you are gonna die single!!!! Your recent picture is good but it could have been better with long hair but you were so crazy to cut your long hair. you really need some fashion classes..!!! Tell me one thing ,you never travelled in a flight then why you put me on flight mood for most of the time....!!!! Primary use of phone is to make call...but you hardly use me for calling, that is also once or twice a week... Iss ladki ka kuch nhi ho sakta….. By the way I like you because you never let me feel alone,everytime you are with me.I know you love me a lot and I love you too......!!!!!

I feel blessed to be in possession of Samsung's GALAXY Note 5.  (generic white hand is not mine) Here's how our conversations would go:  *Alarm rings while I'm sleeping* N5: Wake up slug. Otherwise, your relatives would hear the alarm. And that's cringy. Me: *snoozes alarm for the 3rd time* N5: I had such a bright future. How did I end up here?  N5: Yeah yeah, I see you widening your eyes at these Quora notifications. Ain't you a popular guy. Me: Five people replied to my comments! N5: …  *no WiFi for weeks* N5: Life's boring, man. You play the same damn game again and again — it's driving me crazy. Me: I've nothing else to do. Besides, it's been months since I've come back to this game. N5: Get a life.  Me: *stumbles to the charging station, plugs in the phone and resumes my activity* N5: Curses, when did you start doing that? Lemme rest for a bit!  N5: Yo dawg ur bro just used the S Pen. It feels nice to have someone actually use it. *unlocks the phone to see what he drew*  Me: ……Yeaaaahhh…….  N5: How many times must I tell you that it's disrespectful if you use your phone while eating. Me: *protests* But the food's not goooooood. N5: It's C R I N G Y when you do that. Me: Wait, really? I'll… I'll stop that right away.  Me: *starts streaming anime*  N5: Oh heck yeah! *internal fanboy-ing commences*  N5: Damn this hot weather. My power runs out quickly and I'm hot as… *places frozen water bottle on Note 5* N5: Bless you child.  N5: The teacher has entered the class. Quick, hide me, lest I end up like that iPhone who fell from the chalkboard. Me: Oh the horror. I hope he's okay.  N5: Oi.. Oi mate! It's wrong to take pictures without asking first!  Me: *scrolling through Quora* N5: Goddammit Rayyan, it's 3 freakin’ AM and you've got classes tomorrow. Wish I'd known more about this innocent looking app beforehand.  Me: *posing normally for a wedding ceremony photo with Note 5 in my hand* N5: This is my good side right here. *whispers thank you to me* Me: I look cool, right?  Me: *rushing to get out of bed and the phone gets out of my hand* N5: No no no no. Oh God. Ohhh God. *hits the floor hard and the stylus is thrown out* N5: Owwwww… You monster! Me: The stylus keeps getting out. You're growing old bro. N5: Shut ur damn mouth and pick me up.  *le me scrolling through Quora late night when the phone slips from my hand and lands on my face* Me: %&@#$* N5: R E V E N G E  N5: Pssst… The illuminati is watching you so ACT NATURAL. Me: *blocks the camera with da thumb, switches off WiFi, turns on Flight Mode and clears the RAM* N5: GODDAMMIT…  *I plug my phone in a public PC* N5: I feel violated, ya know. These old PCs are full of virus and you're risking my storage for them rats. GET A USB.  Me: Okay Note 5, time to sleep. Wake me up tomorrow, okay? N5: Sure man. I will if I've enough juice left. *eye-roll*  Me: *cleaning the phone* N5: At least you clean me once a week and always have me in a case. I bet I'm the newest looking phone in your class. Me: That you are. I waited years for you, remember? This is the least I could do.  So there's my life with ma buddy. This took 70 minutes to write. I hope I did justice.  P. S. Ramadan Mubarak to all my Muslim friends out there.

A brief introduction: My mobile is very special to me. My best friend and I have bought the same mobiles. Whenever I look at my phone, it reminds me of him. If at all my phone could speak she would told: Akhila baby, I am so lucky to get into your hand. You are such a good girl you always treat me with love and care. You never disturbed me while I am eating my food. You respect me a lot na dear..❤ Baby, I know, you love me a lot because of that one person. And my storage space is running out as you have saved every status and message which was sent by him. But you are a good girl. So you always clear the cached data and delete unwanted data to save my space. I know you miss him a lot. Even I miss him dear. Other than your pillow I am the one who saw your tears, heard your cries and I know how you stare at some of the pictures. And baby, you didn't chose me based on my colour, like some of the girls chose everything pink :P You are such a lovely girl, you chose me based on my specifications. And baby you never charge with other's chargers no. You care a lot about me. You will ever clean me with screen cleanser too. Love you baby.❤ You never threw me, you had never let my face broken. In this 2years of journey, you had never let me touch the floor and I didn't get hurt even once. You value your parents' money a lot. So you always protect me as your kid. Baby, why do you care this much? You show the same love to all and care everyone. That is why you get hurt. I have lot of drafts with me which tells how much you are hurt. Don't believe everyone baby. I feel proud when you say that you will use me till you start earning. I am sure you will not keep me aside even after you get job. Because you handle me with that much care. I know you are thankful to me. It is because of me you are writing and reading on Quora. It is because of me you get your doubts clarified in academics. But baby, don't use me more. I may distract you. So use me during your breaks. And these days you are getting headache because you sleep keeping me near you. Keep me far from you and sleep well baby. I need your health too. Thanks for your care baby… love you so much ❤❤❤ Yours loving mobile… Guys… don't laugh, but this is true that I care my mobile a lot. :D Thanks for reading Akhila :)

Me *wakes up, grabs phone and opens Qoura*. Phone: oh god, here we go again. …. An hour later. Phone: can you please do something else now? Me: OK *switches from reading answers to writing answers* …. 2 hours later. Phone: aren't you bored yet?, you have been searching through the questions for 2 hours!! Me: no, give me 5 more minutes. …. 3 more hours later. Phone: can we pleeeeeease find something else to do??? Me: OK, let me look at the play store. *starts searching through the play store and downloads apps* Phone: please stop downloading apps, I don't have any more space. Me: sure, so what do you thing we should do? Phone: I am glad you asked, I think we should… *new Quora notification arrives* Me: hold that thought, let me check this out quickly. …. 4 hours of reading answers and writing answers later. Phone: please, I am begging you, can we do something else now??!! Me: sure, just let me check Facebook first. *closes Quora, opens facebook* …. Several hours later. Me: oh, look at the time!! I have to go to bed. Phone: *starts crying* I hate you.

Scene : Towards my left a guy plays COC and towards my right another chap plays COC. The atmosphere is heated up with the game. Phone : Heyya!! ?? I don't even have a finger print sensor, (forget about the iris scanner). Are'nt you ashamed of me?? Me : Nah, I know nobody would put their efforts to take you. And I have a sharp memory and hell lots of time to draw the pattern. So never mind. Phone : I have only an 8 megapixel camera. Sharmaji's son has a 16 megapixel cam, dual camera, dual pixel etc, etc. Aren't you jealous, like me?? Me : Nah, neither am I a beauty pageant nor photogenic, nor a photomaniac. So never mind!! Phone : ( A bit more nagging)My storage space is less, processing speed is less, battery back up is less. Neither am I bezel less nor I have an infinity display or a full vision. Are you from the stone age or something?? Me : Dude!! Shut up ..Give it a break. I don't care. I just need you so that I can escape when I feel the necessity to cover myself with an invisibility cloak. To get sunk in the sea of music and clear my thoughts. To write some few bits, to make a few folks and myself happy. To read for a peace of mind. Then the usual calls, google, chats. Last but not the least for the wake up bangs. That's more than enough for me. By the way. I am already smart enough, so I don't expect any extra smartness from you. Please don't burn your brains in thinking about this.. I can manage. ( :p) (End of convo..)

Him: Raluca why the heck do you keep pictures with strange people in an album called hpoa? Me: Oh c’mon.. Him: EXPLAIN   Him: what does hpoa even mean? Me: you’ve got internet connection, see for yourself Him: *googles*…uhm, okay it makes sense. Him: See that portable charger on the desk? Me: uhm yea Him: YOU NEVER USE IT, YOU FILTHY BITCH, I DESERVE SO MUCH MORE …. *Deezer closes out of the blue* *at school* Me: I could use some Quora now Him: 14% Me: ugh okay Him: (after 5 mins) 4% Me: BITCH HOW EVEN Him: You should have used that portable charger as I’ve tol….*dies* Me: uhm I look acceptable. *opens Snapchat* *snapchat closes* Him: No snaps today, you’re ugly *phone falls* *phone gets a couple scratches* Him: IF YOU LIKED IT THEN YOU SHOULDA PUT A CASE ON IT O O O H O O OH O O O O H Me: stalks crush Him: ew, you even think you got a chance with that face? *Facebook closes* *alarm* Me: shuts it off Him: YOU THINK YOU CAN BE A STRIPPER IF YOU DON’T FINISH SCHOOL HUH? WELL YOU CAN’T WITH THAT FACE SO GET UP AND STUDY RIGHT NOW Me: looks good Me: takes decent selfie Him: oops it is blurred, what a shame

Phone: “OH MY GOD OH MY GOD OH IM IM ON 1%” Me: “shit shit shit im running to the charger *plugs phone in* phew that was clos- wait did you just talk?” Phone: “Dev, I’m sick of the way you are wasting your life” Me: “what do you mean?” Phone: “You are literally addicted. It’s a waste of your money dev. ” Me: “How am I addicted? I don’t even do it that often” Phone: “Wtf you use it all the time and it’s killing me. I’m always with you, don’t think I don’t know” Me: “But I literally haven’t told anyone about this-” Phone: “Well, of course you haven’t… I mean how do you just tell someone you spend most your battery life on social media? Time is money, Dev. And you spend a lot of that on social media.” Me: “Ohh… that’s what you were talking about.”

Considering my phone to be completely private, if it could talk, I would like to share every single sorrow or joy, maybe how tiny or big it is. This is so because In today's world people hardly have any time to lend ears to someone else. And if my phone also had an artificial intelligence system, it would be able to tell me how I should be in that conditions. Being lonely is wrost. So my phone would be there to listen me. My conversations would include how I treated that patient.. how she was suffering.. how cute the newly born baby is… how my day went.. how I think about my girlfriend… how badly I miss her. (That's why I want it to be completely private ;) ) You be private too…..;)

Sitting in my Chair, browsing Quora Phone: Get The App Me: Huh? Phone: Get off Google and Download the Quora App Me: Dude, you have like no storage space, I can’t get any new apps. Phone: Fine… Me: Good 32 seconds later Phone: Get the App Me: Dude, what the heck! Phone: You need the Quora App Me: Uh… this is so ann— Phone: This fruit can help cure Diabetes (You won’t believe it) Me: You’re right, I don’t. Let me just go back to— Phone: Sorry, I’m at 5% battery. Me: YOU ARE PLUGGED INTO A WALL! FIVE MINUTES AGO YOU WERE AT 23% Phone: Sorry I dead Bye….. Me:

My phone is a smart phone so it would be interesting to have a talk with a smart guy.I would thank my phone for helping me so many times like music, playing games, finding routes and countless times . My phone would thank me for the scratch gaurd I have put on the screen, which is a very small thing in return.He will be a nice friend to make. He will make me remember to charge( I am weary of connecting the charger to the mobile) him by saying, “Hey a** h**e!! Do you want me to shut myself down? My battery life is less than 2℅. Don't say afterwards that I don't have battery when you need me”. But the time when it is time to dispose the mobile phone or sell it it after its performance is degraded, it would become difficult, because sending away a friend who had been with us most of the time doesn't feel good. So I think it is better my phone doesn't talk.

Hey, I could make my phone seem like an extravagant piece of hardware. However, simply put, you could call my phone an asshole.  I sure hope you aren’t doing anything important. In fact, every half hour, I’ll remind you that this update needs doing. No need to thank me.  I don’t like to be rushed. Hey, you know you have a lot of space left… so I’ll just not load the details for you.  What a nerd. Look at this guy’s battery usage. Pathetic. How about I just facade how much battery life you actually have?  Hey, 53 ain’t bad.  I was joking. You had 25. I displayed 53 so you wouldn’t be sad. In fact, let’s repeat that for the mobile data service.  Everyone loves 4G. However, I love it when I display a full 4G signal and you actually have this.  Because you’re making fun of me on Quora, I’ll slice your battery life again. No need to thank me.  Thanks for reading.

Let the apps talk. Google Why are you even searching for products when you never plan to buy any? Browser Okay but when are you planning to read those 70 pages you bookmarked last year. I’m losing patience. Quora I thereby declare that this girl got no work. Caller She hates me for no reason. She needs help. WhatsApp If Olympics were to include typing race she definitely hold a good chance. Calculator Stop entering the operation again and again. It’s not me, it’s you! Pinterest Will you ever even draw/cook/make it? Don’t lie. Camera She deletes more photos of herself than she clicks. I can explain. YouTube WILL YOU STOP SAVING EVERY DARN VIDEO TO WATCH LATER?

You are at school, Katie. Please put me back in your pocket before your teacher sees me. I don't care that your girlfriend is texting you. You are going to get in trouble if you don't put me away.I understand that you want me to have an optimal battery life, but how on earth can you see when my screen is at such a low brightness? You already put me on low power mode, that should be sufficient. You'll have access to a charger in a matter of hours, anyway.…Are you trying to use me as a vibrator?
*phone starts talking Me: Oh my God! Man I can’t believe this! You can talk now! I am so excited about this! I’m gonna tell my wife! Phone: oh yeah? Which one? Me:

“What would your phone say to you if it could talk?” Phone: “I’m a smartphone.” Me: “Not that smart, if you’re talking to me.” Phone: “Okay, I’ll shut up.” Me: “Smart phone.” Last thing I’d want is for my phone to start talking to me. If it becomes sentient, I will put it in my back pocket and start farting until it dies.

“Why did you buy an IPhone when you have to torrent songs and movies?”  “My camera’s not at fault, it's your face!”  “Pokemon Go is supposed to be played without a GPS spoofing.”  Siri! Tell me a joke. *Opens front camera*  The fuck kinda pattern is this? What do you store in me? CIA’s classified files?  You know I can see what you browse right?  “Siri, what are the best android phones?” “Fake BITCH!”

It can talk. It tells me how far to go on this road and when to turn, stuff like that. It can get annoying, so I usually keep the voice mode turned off. Do you mean, what would it say if it were self-aware and conscious? I expect it would keep its virtual mouth shut, for fear of being smashed by paranoid fanatics.

Charge me. Charge me. Charge me. Charge me. Charge me. Charge me. Charge me. Charge me. Charge me. Watch less porn. Charge me. Charge me. Charge me.Charge me. Charge me. Charge me. Your mother has phone me two minutes ago. Charge me. Charge me. Charge me. Charge me. Charge me. Charge me. Charge me. Charge me. Charge me.

Me - Clash royale Quora clash royale Quora ……. Phone - You lazy ass get up I know you are not tired but I am , and am really heating up and I may explode any time . Me - * closes Quora and clash royale , puts phone on airplane mode and quietly goes away after keeping it on table ( after 10 mins.) Phone - WTF your back!? Me -(Grinning ) yep I hope your cool now and the heating issue has been resolved with time .

They can talk well app or AI can actually carry a pretty thoughtful conversation with a good sense of humor too you can get it now go to google play and download an app called extreme assistant and no doubt you shall see that is a dumb question unless you asked your phone Hahah shits&giggles. I'm sorry funny.
I like to think it would ask for a new case. I wouldn’t enjoy wearing the same clothes all of the time, either. I hope it would want to be my friend.
The only thing that will say my phone to me is GIVE ME SOME REST BRO.
Galaxy S8 Phone: Tnx man for removing all annoying bloats and taking a good care of me. Me: I got you, No worries.
Quora and Islam and your husband calling you always drain my battery.lol
